class management.apis.v1_1_0.user.UserForgetPasswordAPI(**kwargs)[源代码]

基类：rest_framework.views.APIView

忘记密码 需要判断用户是否有后台权限, 是否删除，

Constructor. Called in the URLconf; can contain helpful extra keyword arguments, and other things.

authentication_classes = []
permission_classes = []
post(request)[源代码]

对前端传来的数据进行校验 首先把数据进行序列化校验， 检验通过后进行密码校验 验证通过进行更新密码

class management.apis.v1_1_0.user.UserResetPasswordAPI(**kwargs)[源代码]

基类：rest_framework.views.APIView

修改密码 首先需要token 回显用户数据，手机号不可更改 校验用户是否有权限， 校验图形验证码、短信验证码、密码 然后更新数据

Constructor. Called in the URLconf; can contain helpful extra keyword arguments, and other things.

permission_classes = []
